page.description: The label for the standard deviation value row in the Grid.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Std. Dev. value label]* property defines what is shown in the standard deviation value row of the Grid Component. The standard deviation row is only shown when the *[ui:Std. Dev.]* property in the [Summary values] section for one or more fields has been checked.
The default value of *[ui:Std. Dev. value label]* is "Std. Dev.".
